welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beloit, a charming city known for its beautiful riverfront, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rock County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Rockford Airport is where all commercial flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Rockford Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods via air transportation.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
